Primal (a nostr client) also can give you a built in Lightning wallet with a Lightning address and connect it to your nostr profile, enabling you to send/receive zaps.

Lightning network is a layer 2 of bitcoin. Basically all you need to connect your nostr to a lightning wallet is a Lightning Address. Lightning Addresses look like an email address and you get it from your wallet provider. Blink and Wallet of Satoshi are good wallet options for this.
Zaps= it‚Äôs just a colloquial term for a piece of the nostr protocol that enables transmission of bitcoin over nostr between users.
Sats = smallest unit of bitcoin. It‚Äôs just a way to avoid talking with decimal places. 1 BTC = 100,000,000 sats. So instead of saying 0.01 BTC you can say 1m sats
